mapper.insert: insert into tb_room(room_id, room_floor, room_desc, room_state, room_type, room_price) values (#{roomId}, #{roomFloor}, #{roomDesc}, #{roomState}, #{roomType}, #{roomPrice})
mapper.select: select r.room_id, r.room_floor, r.room_desc, r.room_state, r.room_type, r.room_price, rm.room_img_id, rm.room_img_addr, rm.priority from tb_room r left join tb_room_img rm on r.room_id = rm.room_id where r.room_id = #{roomId} order by rm.priority desc;
